Interface Script

Method Detail

update

boolean update(org.mozilla.javascript.Context cx,
               org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable scope)
               throws java.io.IOException
Evaluates this script if it was modified. Also evaluates any child scripts, if necessary.

Parameters:
cx - The JavaScript Context
scope - The JavaScript Scope
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem loading the script.

evaluate

void evaluate(org.mozilla.javascript.Context cx,
              org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable scope)
              throws java.io.IOException
Forces this script to be evaluated.

Parameters:
cx - The JavaScript Context
scope - The JavaScript Scope
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem loading the script.

addDependency

void addDependency(Script parent,
                   boolean cascadeReload)
Adds this script as a parent of this object. This is used to remove children that are no longer dependent.

Parameters:
parent - the parent Script
cascadeReload - specifies whether the current script needs to reload when the dependency does
